metadata.title: CVE-2024-44978 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/xe: Free job before xe_exec_queue_putFree job depends on job->vm being valid, the last xe_exec_queue_put candestroy the VM. Prevent UAF by freeing job before xe_exec_queue_put.(cherry picked from commit 32a42c93b74c8ca6d0915ea3eba21bceff53042f)
